channel.title: Emulous Banking Problem

item.title: Emulous Banking Problem
item.dc:creator: @haxifix haxifix
item.description:
@haxifix wrote:

When I call the openUpBank() method, it closes the client and throws a T2 Error. I think T2â€™s are caused because of missing interfaces, but here is the code for the openUpBank() void, see if you can see what is wrong.

public void openUpBank(){ if(c.getOutStream() != null && c != null) { c.getItems().resetItems(5064); c.getItems().rearrangeBank(); c.getItems().resetBank(); c.getItems().resetTempItems(); c.getOutStream().createFrame(248); c.getOutStream().writeWordA(5292); c.getOutStream().writeWord(5063); c.flushOutStream(); } }

Any help will be appreciated.

Read full topic
